version_description:
- fixed crash on deleting custom counters
- fix for showing charts on iPad
- new in 6.0 - widgets are updated real time

- Fixed random crashes on launching app for some users
- Fixed showing white background on iPad usage usage details

- improved stability and minor bug fixes
- updated help & faq links

This app has been updated by Apple to use the latest Apple signing certificate.

- iPhone X Support
